briefdescription.para: Return 1 if the environment variable name is a truthy flag.
Round up KiB to MiB using ceil(), clamped to 32-bit.

simplesect.para: Size in MiB (ceil), or 0 if kib is 0.

briefdescription.para: Parse an integer KiB value from a "Key: 12345 kB" style procfs line.

parameterdescription.para: Receives the parsed KiB value on success.

briefdescription.para: Read a single numeric (KiB) field from a procfs text file.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, -ENOENT if not found, negative errno otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Implementation of runtime metrics (KV counters + RSS sampling).

detaileddescription.para:
This module backs the helpers declared in util_metrics.h:
Process-wide accumulators for KV hits/misses using C11 atomics.
A best-effort function that samples the process peak RSS in MiB.

Environment:
Set IE_DEBUG_RSS=1 to log which source (VmHWM/VmRSS/smaps_rollup/ getrusage/mach) was used and its raw units before conversion.
